entries.title: Entering Home
entries.prayer: Heavenly Father, bless this dwelling and all who enter.
entries.devotionalQuestion: How have I experienced God's hospitality today?
entries.verse: …as for me and my house, we will serve the LORD.

entries.title: Before Meals
entries.prayer: Lord Jesus, bless us and these your gifts, which we are about to receive from your bounty.
entries.devotionalQuestion: Do I recognize God’s provision in each meal?
entries.verse: So, whether you eat or drink, or whatever you do, do all to the glory of God.

entries.title: Starting Work
entries.prayer: O Lord, grant me diligence and integrity in all I do today.
entries.devotionalQuestion: Am I working heartily as for the Lord?
entries.verse: Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men.

entries.title: Before Studying
entries.prayer: Gracious God, grant me wisdom and understanding as I study.
entries.devotionalQuestion: Have I sought Your wisdom before pursuing knowledge?
entries.verse: For the Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.

entries.title: Starting Yard Work
entries.prayer: Creator God, thank You for the beauty of Your creation as I labor.
entries.devotionalQuestion: In what ways do I see God’s hand in creation today?
entries.verse: You visit the earth and water it; you greatly enrich it; the river of God is full of water.
